actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the 2,OOO dollars credit for the purchase of a new principal residence will not be recaptured where the taxpayer replaces it with another principal residence.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that the $2,000 credit for the purchase of a new residence will not be recaptured where the taxpayer replaces such residence with another principal residence.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the 2,OOO dollars credit for the purchase of a new principal residence will not be recaptured where the taxpayer replaces it with another principal residence.
